item.title: German Semnar2018
item.description: June 21 to July 1, 2018 We held “German seminar2018” at Lindow, Germany. World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟

item.title: kamata Early Summer Seminar2018
item.description: June 24,2018 We held “Kamata early summer seminar2018” at Kamata, Tokyo. Opening ceremony Many members including United States, Ecuador and Malaysia participated in the seminar. Keiko Shinsa From the Shodan to the Kyo-shi, all 10 people challenged shinsa. Awards ceremony Everyone passed both excellent writing results and practical skills with excellent results. Other photos are in hereから World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正

item.title: Information About Boston Seminar2018
item.description: Dear members. Boston seminar 2018 (June 7-10)- see the following link for detail info. http://bostoniaido.com/seminar_2018.html Events schedule MJER Iaido events World MJER Iaido Federation © 正統正流無雙直傳英信流居合道国際連盟
